document.full_text: deutsche bank  will change the legal status of its main u.s. subsidiary to avoid having to endow it with up to $20 billion in fresh capital, the wall street journal reported on wednesday.
document.title: deutsche bank to restructure u.s. operations: report
lines_and_colors: deutsche bank  will change the legal status of its main u.s. subsidiary to avoid having to endow it with up to $20 billion in fresh capital, the wall street journal reported on wednesday.
